lender.name: Reese
lender.loan_because: Kiva is efficient and makes an immediate impact.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.occupational_info: I send nurses to sick people.

lender.name: Kester
lender.loan_because: To help people who are in need.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: Initially I loaned because a co-worker brought me to the website and I was impressed with the process. I have high hopes for my folks.
lender.occupational_info: Process contracts and billing, copy documents, answer the phone, run reports.

lender.name: Clint
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in people's lives.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: I am unable to obtain a mortgage for my home because I have "no credit". I feel that all hard-working people that pay their bills deserve a chance to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a medical office that primarily serves the geriatric community. I have many duties, most of which require me to deal with people very patiently.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people through simple capitalism.
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer, and I work for an insurance company. My main responsibility is to develop changes to our website as insurance changes.

lender.name: LUIS
lender.loan_because: I am of chile FABRIC AND I NEED TO BUY AN AVERAGE OF TRANSPORT
lender.occupational_info: MY JOB is to produce VESTIMENTA OF THE MEDICAL TEAMS OF ALL PARTS OF COUNTRY

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: as an entrepreneur I understand the struggles of trying to start up a business and I am fortunate enough to be in a place where I have tremendous opportunity. If each of us helped out one other person, imagine the good that can be done.
lender.occupational_info: I design and develop websites and content management systems for small businesses worldwide.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I have been given so much and I do not deserve it. As a Christian and as an American I want to share my relative abundance to help others live a better life. I want people in other parts of the world to see that with hard work it is possible to have a better life for themselves and for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school mathematics teacher in a private church-related school of over 600 students. Our school now includes international students from S Korea and China in addition to students from over 50 different churches.

lender.name: ACE KINGSTEC
lender.loan_because: ACE Kingstec is a group devoted to promoting entrepreneurship, Kiva fits perfectly with our mission.

lender.name: janet
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I am in the water treatment business ensuring our community treats wastewater and reuses it for irrigation.

lender.name: Heiko
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: it is directly empowering.
lender.occupational_info: I assist those who are open, in saying 'yes' and manifesting dreams.

lender.name: Rylee & Teaghan
lender.loan_because: We like to share . . . except our treats
lender.occupational_info: We like to play outside, take trips to the lake, visit our family in Austin, and tear the stuffing out of any new toy.

lender.name: Olivia & Augusta
lender.loan_because: We want to help people achieve their goals an improve the life for their families.

lender.name: joe
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can afford it and it is the right thing to do to help people. I have been inactive for too long in helping others.
lender.occupational_info: It is my job to keep the computers up and running for the company I work.

lender.name: james
lender.occupational_info: Analysis and Forecast world market.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I have traveled a fair amount in South and Central America and appreciate their cultures, spirit, and entrepreneurship. I hope to help people of all nations in their endeavors.

lender.name: Tiggy
lender.loan_because: I like to help fellow human beings :)

lender.name: Darlene
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and I want to try and bless someone else who will appreciate it!

lender.name: fabietto
lender.occupational_info: human rights

lender.name: P-M
lender.loan_because: Because I am a poor person in a rich country - I have a car, a roof over my head, enough food for my pets and myself, social security ( I am disabled), free health care etc. I am lucky but not everyone is.
lender.occupational_info: I study biology and teaching.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I want to. We have an obligation to help one another.

lender.name: Ben Lovejoy
lender.loan_because: I run a small business in the UK, and see it as a great opportunity to be able to help people in other parts of the world do the same
lender.occupational_info: Stylish, contemporary photography

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: What goes around comes around. I do something nice for someone else, something nice will happen for me. :-)
lender.occupational_info: repairing/configuration of computers and peripherals.

lender.name: mark
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to have a good paying job, and incredible opportunities. It was not always like that in my life. I have had to endure great adversity in my life. My belief in Jesus leads me to want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I build telephone and data networks for the telephone company.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I am aware of how comfortable I am here in the UK
lender.occupational_info: I am one of the people who make the Internet work

lender.name: domingos
lender.loan_because: KIVA is the best model to help people. wath is few to me, can be very important to many others
lender.occupational_info: i'm teacher of physics and I like to read and paint

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I want to help others succeed in ways that they define as success.
lender.occupational_info: I help people and organizations understand what makes them unique, i.e., strategy consulting. I also help organizations become environmentally sustainable.

lender.name: Adriano
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: nobody can save the world alone, but everybody can help someone
lender.occupational_info: I proof-read and prepare manuscripts for technical production. The publishinghouse I work for produce schoolbooks for norwegians at the age 6-15

lender.name: Gareth
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work on a survey ship looking for oil and gas under the seabed.

lender.name: Damian
lender.loan_because: I love to donate my resources to good causes.
lender.occupational_info: I am a fighter in the war against misplaced passwords and failed mail merges. Guardian of fast data speeds and destroyer of fantasy football accounts. That about explains what I do.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I want to help others

lender.name: Dixie
lender.loan_because: Microloans are a great way for regular folk to try their best to make a difference. :)

lender.name: JoL
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone directly and a little goes a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I am now retired and working in local libraries as needed.

lender.name: Kat
lender.loan_because: I was traveling through east Africa a few years ago and had the chance to stay with a couple of NGO workers in a small village in western Kenya. It ended up being the house where Kiva was built. The volunteers there were associated with the Village Enterprise Fund and introduced us to the world of microfinancing in developing countries. I got to see first hand how much people can be helped with donations that seem like nothing to us.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies market themselves online through display advertising and e-mail marketing.

lender.name: Andre
lender.loan_because: I'm healthy
lender.occupational_info: I encourage art

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together
lender.occupational_info: I help students and faculty get engaged in the community, and I help the community link to the campus

lender.name: Sir Jebbington
lender.loan_because: People need loans.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info:
I am a former military and commercial airline pilot, turned marketing, communications, and public affairs professional. In addition, I am an avid blogger and strong enthusiastic participant in the social web.
I have a passion for travel, photography, food, wine, chocolate, writing, and reading. I am originally from New England, have lived in both Boston and San Francisco, and now live in Washington DC with my husband, Jonathan.

lender.name: Foolius
lender.loan_because: I feel those who seek opportunity deserve a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I'm developing a technology to make medical research (such as for cancer) and understanding human biology easier.

lender.name: Dale
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is required.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: We all have much to share and give to each other - supporting people through Kiva is a wonderful opportunity for all of us.

lender.name: Alishahndra
lender.loan_because: It makes me so happy to know that I am able to help others lift themselves out of poverty that I usually end up with tears in my eyes and a smile on my face.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I've seen people struggling, first hand in other countries, and I am doing something to help those willing to take action.

lender.name: Leonor
lender.loan_because: It's a good way to directly help small businesses to start or to develop.
lender.occupational_info: I am a sociologist, trying to understand how we live together and why...

lender.name: Rosalind Lynam
lender.loan_because: I believe microfinance can end world poverty.

lender.name: Jared
lender.loan_because: I donate with the hope that I can make someones life better. I believe that developing countries are a key part of the world economy. I myself would like to start a business in the future, so I am always in support of other entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I design and build landscapes/gardens for homes and businesses.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I received a Gift Certificate for my Birthday - what a great idea!!

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because:
I can and therefore I should.
My son Taron (pictured) believes treasure is for sharing.
lender.occupational_info: Life has been good to me. It should be good to everybody.

lender.name: J4 Entrepreneurs
lender.loan_because: I believe in the powerful relationship and magic created when an entrepreneurial spirit is enabled to serve his/her community.
lender.occupational_info: I partner with developing, non-profit organizations supporting diverse communities. As partners, we economically empower local communities through the creation of careers and financial wellness programs.

lender.name: Jorge
lender.loan_because: What awesome Idea to be part in the new world path.... What awesome to be part in the creation of a new world
lender.occupational_info: Live as a master

lender.name: diane
lender.loan_because: lending is something I can do to make a positive change the life of others. I feel that I have been blessed in my own life and want to share that. lending is a great way for me to help others
lender.occupational_info: my work involves caring for the elderly

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: relationship marketing, poker, and snowboarding

lender.name: Stargazer
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a difference to someone in need around the world with a portion of what God so graciously gives to me. Change begins with small steps, a kindness to others is one of the greatest rewards.
lender.occupational_info: My husband is a Baptist minister, in addition we own poultry farms and raise cattle.

lender.name: Gwen
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate that I can!

lender.name: alessio
lender.loan_because: i really believe it can helps!
lender.occupational_info: i'm a bar-owner

lender.name: Iron Chefettes
lender.loan_because: We want to share our harvest with others so they might have great food to cook too!

lender.name: brendan
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do and provides a good role model for my children and friends.

lender.name: Carolina Microfinance
lender.loan_because: We believe in, and wish to further, this movement!
lender.occupational_info: The Carolina Microfinance Initiative (CMI) exists as a center to catalyze interest and facilitate action in microfinance on the campus of University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill. We are a seedbed for the growth of industry knowledge and we are a call for the informed engagement of our community in the world at large.

lender.name: David & Mattea Ursino
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of a loan rather than a donation since the loan beneficiary becomes accountable and therefore more likely to succeed. It's a great way to teach accountability and responsibility to a new entrepreneur
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes in the Greater Toronto Area.

lender.name: Karina
lender.loan_because: i can
lender.occupational_info: i make websites

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Helping other entrepreneur's across the planet will make the world a much better place for my children to grow up in.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: I believe microfinance has the power to affect change!
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time student studying sociology and demography.

lender.name: Michael
lender.whereabouts: South Curl Curl New South Wales

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I would like to be part of wiping poverty off the face of the planet! And these people all have dreams...... what more reason do I need?
lender.occupational_info: I study the interactions and relationships of differnet species that interact together in naural settings.

lender.name: Gazania
lender.loan_because: enterprise is the path from povetry to prosperity.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: Help your neighbor before yourself.
lender.occupational_info: n/a

lender.name: Alberto
lender.loan_because: I have to desintoxicate from ebay, and Kiva is much better for two reasons. The first is that money comes back, and the last is that it makes me feel less guilty.

lender.name: adarsh
lender.occupational_info: I want to promote golf in a big way in India, India has a big potential for golf. I want to give small jobs to people through different golf activities. I have a project and an Idea, if any one needs I can sent it accross by email. who so ever want s to join please contact my email. koreatex@vsnl.com

lender.name: Amelia
lender.loan_because: It's fun!
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying nursing

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I feel so blessed to be born in America. I didn't choose it. I want to give back to others who live in other parts of the world so their hard work will allow them to make a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I supervise engineers, who design equipment.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Makes me feel good:)
lender.occupational_info: The video link that appears on my profile is a fantastic video to describe how it works and the feeling. Feel good and do something for another person, JUMP out of your apprehension and loan someone some money and truly do something to better the world we live in.

lender.name: Chaiyatorn
lender.loan_because: We can all help to make a better world
lender.occupational_info: I don't work. I try not to. Better to do something useful for the world if you can.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish and he eats for a day. Loan a man or woman the money for fishing supplies, he or she eats every day.

lender.name: greg
lender.loan_because: To help people around the globe succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an international company that provides insurance coverage.

lender.name: Julien Blanchard
lender.loan_because: it makes so much sense! "Be the change you want to see", Gandhi

lender.name: VinZ
lender.loan_because: I'm born more lucky than others. And also because charity will buy me VIP treatment in afterlife with golden teaspoons, plenty of hot virgins, broadband mobile phones and my own personal fully furnished cloud!
lender.occupational_info: I make a kind of telephone bills

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I love
lender.occupational_info: I serve for a church.

lender.name: Everlin Wong
lender.loan_because: give and you shall receive!
lender.occupational_info: No regards of how much I earn today, I've pledged my online sales net profits as no-interest microloans for Kiva entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: Everyone in the world deserves a chance to live happily and comfortably. Even if I consider myself poor by American standards, $25 isn't too much to reach out!
lender.occupational_info: Im mostly insired by nature, the natural world, animals and people who respect and love the earth. I fight for what I believe in and never back down.

lender.name: Stuart & Lynda
lender.loan_because: through KIVA we can make a loan of an affordable amount to help someone help themself
lender.occupational_info: I help people buying property and advise on construction problems

lender.name: Richee
lender.occupational_info: I am grateful for the things I have and treasure the people who help without expecting anything in return. "The secret to living is giving" ~ Anthony Robbins

lender.name: ACWriter
lender.loan_because: Loan(s) funded by payments for page views of Associated Content article on Kiva.org.

lender.name: Andie and Tom
lender.loan_because: we can.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: An older boy is making me
lender.occupational_info: The job title is pretty self-explanatory

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: It creates more justice in the world
lender.occupational_info: Designing containment barriers to increase energy efficiency of computer data centers

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I simply want to help in some way. My mother always inspired me to care about others who have less. My giving will hopefully make a difference and be a tribute to who she was.

lender.name: mike
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship and the spread of responsible capitalism
lender.occupational_info: I am a financial advisor and accountant

lender.name: Martin & Natalie
lender.loan_because: Trying to turn a bit of $ into a loot of good.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I want to help women be successful so they are healthy & have healthy families.
lender.occupational_info: I am in school to become a nurse-midwife so that I can help women have babies and raise their babies well.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I believe that we all need to assist others all over the world. I have been blessed to be able to travel and I feel I need to share what I have.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.occupational_info: I help test things to make sure that they are safe.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: As an animal, I know what it is like to be marginalized - it is the duty of those who have more to aid those who have less.
lender.occupational_info: Mostly I am occupied by feeding myself a steady diet of ants, but occasionally I have been known to write now and again.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: Matthew 25:31-46
lender.occupational_info: I am currently studying to be a doctor and I am getting a Masters In Public Health. I am not sure what my career will look like, but I'm interested in Emergency Medicine and Emergency Preparedness.

lender.name: Tory
lender.loan_because: buttes

lender.name: UU Chattanooga RE
lender.loan_because: To help people and prevent poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Students

lender.name: Abel
lender.loan_because: that could have been me.

lender.name: Judy & Cheyenne
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone follow their dream as I have been able to follow mine.
lender.occupational_info: I write about and market western and wildlife art.

lender.name: Ed.
lender.loan_because: I want to do something to help someone in the world who is not as fortunate as I am.
lender.occupational_info: I work for different people to help them write things and communicate to others about their businesses.

lender.name: Jose Bravo
lender.loan_because: I believe a small bit can do a BIG difference

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: Hope, prosperity and security lead to peace. Governments don't understand. It's up to us.

lender.name: Mia
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference.

lender.name: Beathe Helen
lender.loan_because: I get to lend a helping hand.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: people trying to better themselves are inspiring by their effort! Although I cannot loan much at a time, I am grateful I am in a place in life that I may help and I am grateful for the spark of inspiration that the efforts of these entrepreneurs kindle in my own soul.
lender.occupational_info:
I loan in honor of my family - those that came before me, my current family, and for all of those that will come after me!
I am only one, but still I am one. I cannot do everything, but still I can do something; and because I cannot do everything, I will not refuse to do something that I can do. Helen Keller

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: The people who want to borrow through Kiva are hard workers who just need a helping hand to support themselves, their children and families. I respect that and I am proud to be a small part of that help. The world needs more helping hands.
lender.occupational_info: The hardest and most rewarding job I have is mother to a son with special needs. I spent many years as a legal child advocate, representing abused or neglected children in court to protect them.

lender.name: Eldon
lender.loan_because:
in the words of Samuel P. Putnam (1838-1896),he don't:
WHY DON'T HE LEND A HAND?
You say there is a God Above the boundless sky, A wise and wondrous deity Whose strength none can defy You say that he is seated Upon a throne most grand, Millions of angels at his beck . . . Why dont he lend a hand?
See how the earth is groaning, What countless tears are shed, See how the plague stalks forward And brave and sweet lie dead. Homes burn and hearts are breaking, Grim murder stains the land; You say he is omnipotent . . . Why dont he lend a hand?
Behold, injustice conquers; Pain curses every hour; The good and true and beautiful Are trampled like the flower. You say he is our father, That what he wills doth stand; If he is thus almighty Why dont he lend a hand?
What is this monarch doing Upon his golden throne, To right the wrong stupendous, Give joy instead of moan? With his resistless majesty, Each force at his command, Each law his own creation . . . Why dont he lend a hand?
Alas! I fear hes sleeping, Or is himself a dream, A bubble on thoughts ocean, Our fancys fading gleam. We look in vain to find him Upon his throne so grand, Then turn your vision earthward, Tis we must lend a hand.
Tis we must grasp the lightning, And plow the rugged soil; Tis we must beat back suffering, And plague and murder foil; Tis we must build the paradise And bravely right the wrong; The god above us faileth, The god within is strong.
lender.occupational_info: I taught criminal and US constitutional law at the Univ. of South Carolina Law School for nearly 36 years until my wife and I retired, first to St. Petersburg, Florida, USA, and (more recently) the old working-port city of Puntarenas, Costa Rica (the background in the photo is the "backyard" of my house in Cocal, Puntarenas), with good pensions in 2005. Aside from contributing to "progressive" politicians and liberal causes (which we also frequently do), I can think of no better use of our good fortune (at least until we will need to attend to our health needs) than to help those less fortunate than we are to better their lives and their communities - through applied intelligence and efforts. God(oops)speed to you.

lender.name: Grant
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies make better, faster business decisions by making use of information they store in their computer databases.

lender.name: Eric Pierce
lender.loan_because: There is no more personal and effective way to help fight global poverty than through microfinancing one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info:
I am currently a student at the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign studying Sociology and Computer Science. My goal is to work in a field where I can help to provide economic, social and technological resources to developing regions.
Check this out these links for other programs working along the same lines: http://laptop.org/
http://www.intel.com/intel/worldahead/classmatepc/
http://www.innovationsforlearning.org

lender.name: Chelsea
lender.loan_because: It will help people have better lives, and get out there and achieve their dreams!
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school student in Texas which is alot of work with AP classes and french classes. But it can also be alot of fun.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world
lender.occupational_info: I work with large companies to help them solve business problems using our software solutions

lender.name: Danni
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school teacher teaching psychology, sociology, US government and economics.

lender.name: Colton
lender.loan_because: I want to irradicate world poverty and I believe microfinance is the most sound means of doing so.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: this is a wonderful way to encourage and stimulate entrepreneurs - everywhere! My start at my first business came from family and a commercial bank. I know how difficult it can be to get start-up and expansion funds.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I volunteer at state parks, the local library, Habitat for Humanity, Community Emergency Response Teams and serve on a couple of NFP boards.

lender.name: psam
lender.loan_because: There was a time that I needed a loan and no lending institution would help me. A friend loaned me the money I desperately needed. I'm passing on the gift of friendship.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I know it can be hard to achieve your dreams and sometimes all it takes is someone to give you a chance and lend you a helping hand.

lender.name: Kath
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering people to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I use herbs and nutrition to help people cure illness and to live a healthy lifestyle

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: I believe in generosity.

lender.name: Lorraine & Julia
lender.loan_because: we like to help others.

lender.name: Przemek
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I'm spending too much time in front of a computer

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of microfinancing to improve the lives of hardworking people. I've been lucky to have been helped by other people in the past and know what a difference a little support can make. Kiva gives me the opportunity to help others in return.
lender.occupational_info: I track the number of people in my area who have a disease they can get from other people or animals. When more people are sick than usual, I help find out why and help stop other people from getting sick.

lender.name: Joelyn K
lender.loan_because: This is my tithe to justice in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach freshmen in college: math calculations, pre-algebra, elementary algebra, and a math review course.

lender.name: Jeanette and Logan
lender.loan_because: Our heart's go out to the less fortunate and Iwe would like to help.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: Just want to leave a better world to my children than the one I got from my parent. Kiva is one way to make this happens.

lender.name: mohammad
lender.loan_because:
I have a dream to build a school. I worked hard to bought the land,because my wife has a dream to have private school. with this reason, I joined in kiva.
I think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
with this reason, I joined in kiva.
I need much money to build my school,I hope kiva will help me to do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach some private student to understand about computer and tecnology

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: It's great to be able to have an impact at a personal level with entrepreneurs.

lender.name: rstanley
lender.loan_because: I wanted to help people build something that may carry them forward. Teach a man to fish vs. give him a fish concept.
lender.occupational_info: I am heavily involved in technology, business and the internet. I am happy to share any success and information that I may have with others. You must give in order to receive but giving is the rewarding part.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: everyone has the right to opportunity.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I want to!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a senior in high school with aspirations to help others.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: We've been blessed and we actively care about others.
lender.occupational_info: I assist the critically wounded and ill.

lender.name: Kathleen and Mel
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner and I know how important credit is to grow a business.

lender.name: Moein
lender.loan_because: i know there are people who needs this money
lender.occupational_info: just think about the happiness you can give to someone which is far more valuable than 25$ or more!

lender.name: Debbie & Dan
lender.loan_because: We have been extremely fortunate and wish to share our good fortune with others who show the initiative to provide for their families

lender.name: Richard
lender.occupation: working for a large investment bank
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: greasing the wheels of social-democracy or making rich people richer and poor people poorer. Depends on your take on the world!

lender.name: shandy, Hans & Finley
lender.loan_because: It makes me smile inside and out!

lender.name: Mark Alcorn
lender.loan_because: Microfinance can break poverty and provide hope. It empowers people to be self reliant. Microloans can have immediate impact on women and children enabling security, better health and education.
lender.occupational_info:
I help hospitals find technology that prevent errors, improve processes and save lives.
I am Director of Missions at FUMC Coppell, TX markjalcorn@gmail.com

lender.name: Patrick and Lori
lender.loan_because: we are blessed.
lender.occupational_info: Lori is a student working to improve people's health. Patrick is working to make sure people who get sick can pay for it.

lender.name: Isabel
lender.loan_because: I made money at a lemonade stand with my sister and now I want to help someone else with the money.
lender.occupational_info: I go school.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: "To leave the world a bit better; whether by a healthy child, a garden patch, or a redeemed social condition. To know even one life has breathed easier because you have lived. This is to have succeeded." -Ralph Waldo Emerson
lender.occupational_info: I help people feel beautiful inside & out by treating their skin. :)

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: The capacity to grow does not happen on its own. The benefit of one, enriches the lives of many. Together we do great things.
lender.occupational_info: I think creatively about making technology useful for people.

lender.name: Clyde
lender.loan_because: it is my duty to give back to humanity...
lender.occupational_info: helping others to be healthy through exercise, nutrition, emotional, and spiritual support...

lender.name: Linda
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home and take care of household chores, plus our small farm while my husband goes to work.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I've lived in the developing world and was transformed by the people I met and worked with. This is a small way I can pay forward the gifts I received. I also want my daughters to learn about and connect with amazing people around the world who are doing amazing things with their lives and in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I teach businesspeople the skills to communicate with each other so they get more done, create richer relationships, and become their best selves at work and beyond.

lender.name: Edrin
lender.loan_because: Every enterpreneur in this world deserves a chance to get a kickstart which in turn makes their life better. Chances for to get a kickstart in business is more easier in my country than those countries such as Africa and others. Therefore helping those in need is what drives me to join Kiva.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I want to support entrepreneurs who need help to develop financial independence.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a business consultant for over 30 years: helping companies to become more profitable.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: everyone who can should be helping out those who can't.
lender.occupational_info: Supporting families and communities grow stronger and more caring

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: I am able to and to honor my mother.
lender.occupational_info: I'm the mother of a high school age son who has a busy schedule. I also volunteer as a child advocate in our local court system.

lender.name: Robyn and James
lender.occupational_info: We own a dance studio and fitness centre

lender.name: Joshua
lender.occupational_info: I do research on the genetics of complex human traits and diseases.

lender.name: Carley
lender.loan_because: Doing just a little bit can help make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I take x-rays to help physicians diagnose medical conditions.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva is a wonderful idea. Helping people help themselves is the way to make them self-sufficient and feeling good about themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help our customers implement our software so they get the best benefit from it.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can.
lender.occupational_info: Giving kids who otherwise have nothing to grow up with an aspiration of quality in their lives.

lender.name: Polly
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a fair chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I teach grade 3 students. They are 7 and 8 years old. They're happy and curious and excited about learning. They keep me going!

lender.name: jamesaubrey
lender.loan_because: people who are willing to work their way out of poverty need to know it's not a futile effort.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Roman Catholic priest serving in the Archdiocese of Oklahoma City. I am also an attorney with an interest in immigration law and policy.

lender.name: Kavi and Jasmeen
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: It works.

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: I want to steward the resources that God gives me and to support others in their good work.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: hard work and dedication deserve proper recognition.
lender.occupational_info: My work is my passion. I help people lead more rewarding lives.

lender.name: Paidipati Ravi
lender.loan_because: The Almighty has provided me in surplus, and i wish to share this with those who are in real need.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Business Analyst in the Banking Industry.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I want global poverty eradicated in my lifetime.

lender.name: Piero
lender.loan_because: Motivates people to work and pursue their dreams.

lender.name: Cody
lender.loan_because: They need it more than I do
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a sophomore at the University of Washington. Since I love being around and taking care of people, my major is set upon becoming a nurse. What separates me most from other guys (other than becoming a nurse), is that I have a long strand of hair behind my head.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed and want to share what I've been blessed with.

lender.name: Yitch
lender.loan_because: maybe, just maybe, Jeffrey Sachs may be right and we can put an end to poverty by 2015. The first world should try its best to help the third.
lender.occupational_info: Engineer with understanding in psychology

lender.name: Leon
lender.loan_because: The world is an awesome place, and it should be made better.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school student. The funds I lend are made through various online sites, most notably Predictify.
